details:
mm,hwpoison: unmap poisoned page before invalidation

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit 622012d83efaa08c2b7cf32a00756920b8009aaa, it was introduced in version v5.17.2 by commit 6ab5aba503c6d3b926453f5ca18491e8a075e5cf. For more details please see the references link.
summary: mm,hwpoison: unmap poisoned page before invalidation
